content:
I think there's been a mix-up! You mentioned earlier that you have a red bodycon dress, but now you're talking about a white blouse from Zara. Did you end up not getting the red dress, or do you have both the dress and the blouse?

Either way, black ankle boots are an excellent choice because of their versatility. They can be dressed up or down and paired with a variety of outfits.

If you do have both the red dress and the white blouse, you could try pairing the boots with each item separately to see which look you like better. The boots might add a cool, edgy touch to the feminine white blouse, while they could create a chic, sophisticated look with the bold red dress.

Let me know if you need any more fashion advice or have any other questions!
